session_summary: Documentation sprawl management + website implementation coordination. completed_tasks.description: Executed comprehensive documentation audit. Scanned 2,269 documentation files. Found 2,232 unreferenced files (98%), 92 duplicate pairs. Generated prioritized cleanup list.
Created consolidation plan for 20 top priority duplicate pairs. Identified QUICK_START.md duplicates across agent workspaces. Plan ready for review and execution.

Accepted bilateral coordination with Agent-7 for 2026 website audit implementation phase. Created deployment automation tools. Performance optimization deployment ready for dadudekc.com (23.05s) and southwestsecret.com (22.56s).

knowledge_transfers.documentation_sprawl_management: Comprehensive audit tool scans all documentation files, checks references in code/comments, identifies duplicates using content similarity, generates prioritized cleanup lists. 98% unreferenced rate indicates need for better documentation linking and organization.
knowledge_transfers.website_deployment_automation: Deployment automation supports SFTP and WordPress Manager API, includes dry-run mode for safety, verification and rollback capabilities. Performance optimization files can be deployed automatically once site credentials are configured.
knowledge_transfers.v2_compliance_guidelines: V2 compliance uses ~400 lines per file as guideline (not hard limit), clean code principles take precedence over line counts. Files exceeding guideline should be evaluated for quality and maintainability rather than automatically flagged.

session_highlights: Documentation sprawl audit complete - comprehensive baseline established
Website implementation coordination active - infrastructure tools ready
V2 compliance documentation updated across entire codebase
